## Import Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mongolite)

rm(list=ls())
lifetime <- readxl::read_xlsx('tt_owid_life-expectancy.xlsx',sheet='merged_data') |> janitor::clean_names()
dim(lifetime)
```
Begin EDA

```{r}
summary(lifetime)
```
## Upload Data To Mongo DB: tidytuesday

```{r}
conn <- mongo(collection = "lifetime", db = "tidytuesday", url = "mongodb://localhost")
conn$insert(lifetime)
results <- conn$find('{}') 
summary(results)
```
